attributes.action: Announce a second referendum or revoke article 50 by the 29th March 2019
attributes.background: Theresa May’s Brexit deal has now been rejected twice. To prevent crashing out of the EU, the UK should either put the decision back to the people, or stop the Brexit process as a whole.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure which course of action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you would like a second referendum you could sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235138

If you would like Article 50 revoked you could sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241584
